account.action.eraseAll.describe:
Account data will be cleared.
  
Be sure to back up your wallet, otherwise you will permanently lose it and all assets.

account.action.remove.describe:
This Action will remove this wallet from the app.

App can not restore your wallet, you can restore with its seed phrase / private key.

Be sure to back up your wallet, otherwise you will permanently lose it and all assets.

backup.notice.describe:
If you lose your <1>seed phrase</1> or <3>private key</3>, you won’t be able to recover you wallet.

Obtaining <5>seed phrase</5> or  <7>private key</7> means owning all assets.

Please <9>protect</9> them carefully
